comment: Professor sakib was excellent. The teaching assistant however, miss Ananya Deepthi Pitla, does not know how to effectively teach and communicate. Professor sakib was only for the first 4 weeks.The assistant taught the class rest of the semester.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Accessible outside class

comment: Dr. Sakib provides useful explanations and is responsive during class sessions, which helps clarify complex topics in real time. However, communication outside of class especially over email was limited, which sometimes made it difficult to get support when working on assignments independently.
Professor Sakib is outstanding and very inspirational.

This professor doesn't really seem to want to teach and lets the students present their homework in front of the class every week through PowerPoint. I haven't had a single lecture from him besides the first one where he tried to explain the group project. His assistant then took over for the rest of the 8 classes & didn't lecture either. Avoid.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Group projects--So many papers
